description: Chefs Macks & Bryan are bringing fine flawless flavors to the streets of LA, and once you eat Mad Pambazos’ rad cuisine, you’ll certainly agree that the quality of this food is amazingly insane. You’ll only find locally sourced ingredients in this environmentally conscious mobile kitchen, which is why their selection of Pambazos (classic Mexican salsa-dipped & pressed sandwiches) are all incredibly delicious. Sink your teeth into their Toast the Knowing - Smoked Potatoes, Housemade Chorizo, Sunny Egg, and Salsa Verde - or their Toecutter: Guajillo- Braised Goat Shoulder with Oaxaca Cheese. And there’s much, much more!So mambo your way to Mad Pambazos for this traditional street dish with a tasty gourmet twist.
name: Mad Pambazos
